issue.title: chunk_view::size const is not implemented correctly

discussion.p: The implementation of chunk_view::size const simply returns to-unsigned-like(div-ceil(ranges::distance(base_), n_)), where div-ceil is defined in as:

Since the types of ranges::distance(base_) and n_ are range_difference_t<const V> and range_difference_t<V> respectively, this makes the div-ceil's template deduction fail when the two are not the same.

blockquote.pre: constexpr auto size() requires sized_range<V>; constexpr auto size() const requires sized_range<const V>;
constexpr auto size() requires sized_range<V>; constexpr auto size() const requires sized_range<const V>;
